mapper.insert: INSERT INTO type_pool ( subject_id, plate_name, amount, gmt_create, gmt_modified ) VALUES ( #{typePool.subjectId}, #{typePool.plateName}, #{typePool.amount}, #{typePool.gmtCreate}, #{typePool.gmtModified} );
mapper.update: UPDATE type_pool SET subject_id = #{typePool.subjectId}, plate_name = #{typePool.plateName}, amount = #{typePool.amount}, gmt_modified = #{typePool.gmtModified} WHERE plate_id=#{typePool.plateId}
mapper.select: SELECT plate_id, subject_id, plate_name, amount FROM type_pool
SELECT plate_id, subject_id, plate_name, amount FROM type_pool LIMIT #{page},#{limit}
